title: ollama-cli
summary: Command-line interface for pulling, running, and managing local LLM models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client library for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, enabling local LLM usage in LangChain workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama supporting multiple models, code highlighting, and document upload.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama with async support and streaming capabilities.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension powered by Ollama for local code completion.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama enabling local LLM inference in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose files for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Example repository demonstrating RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) with Ollama and LangChain.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface for Ollama models with session memory and model switching.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistent storage support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot integration for Ollama allowing users to chat with local LLMs in Discord servers.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack app that brings Ollama LLMs into Slack channels with thread support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI assistance using Ollama models inside notes.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust client for Ollama with async support and serde serialization.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with streaming and embedding support.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm package providing the official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI package for the official Python client to interact with Ollama’s REST API.
